DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study evaluate therapeutic effect functional bioactive supplement associate hypocaloric equilibrate diet treat obese overweight individual . The functional bioactive supplement , contain antioxidant extract rosemary , oligosaccharides derive lactulose bioactive peptide , develop satiety control , improve anti-inflammatory response antioxidant defense mechanism well weight loss .
DOC.brief_title: Functional Bioactive Supplement Effect Lost Weight Treatment
DOC.detailed_description: A randomize , parallel , double-blind , control perform evaluate therapeutic effect functional bioactive supplement associate hypocaloric equilibrate diet treatment obesity overweight . Women age 18 65 year obesity overweight diagnosis ( IMC > 25 < 35 kg/m2 ) include study . The clinical trial perform Clinical Nutrition Department La Paz University Hospital , Madrid . All volunteer receive dietetic treatment 1500 Kcal/day physical activity recommendation study .
DOC.criteria: Women 45 75 year old ; Overweight ( IMC ≥25 < 30 Kg/m2 ) obese ( IMC ≥30 < 35 Kg/m2 ) volunteer Signed informed consent . Subjects drug consumption ( lipidlowering , oral hypoglycemic agent / hypertensive ) less one month period ; Subjects Diabetes Mellitus insulin dependent ; Individuals stop smoke next 12 week ( study ) ; Subjects increase alcohol consumption ( > 1 glass vine ) ; Subjects consume drug , vitamin , mineral , prebiotics or/and probiotic interfere body 's response extract 2 week baseline ; Subjects drug consumption special diet due disease celiac disease , chronic renal failure , etc ; Subjects disorder associate eat behaviour ; Subjects drug supplement consumption weight lose ; Subjects physical problem comply recommendation physical activity diet indicate ; Subjects refuse perform indicate dietary change throughout study ; Subjects diseases could involucrate weight lose ( control hypothyroidism , serious psychiatric illness , etc . ) ; Subjects mental disease low cognitive function ; Subjects severe disease ( hepatic , kidney , cancer… ) ; Pregnant woman lactate ; Subjects physical problem comply recommendation physical activity . Subjects intensive physical activity ;
